channel.title: Market Activities on Hengli | Energy
channel.description: Recent content in Market Activities on Hengli | Energy

item.title: Company Named Core Supplier for Industry Leader
item.description: Through sustained dedication in the new energy power sector, we’ve achieved another major milestone: Secured a strategic order from Jiebu Power and officially become their core lithium battery supplier. This partnership demonstrates strong market recognition of our solutions and elevates our comprehensive competitiveness in power lithium batteries to new heights.

item.title: Company Named Core Supplier for Industry Leader
item.description: Through sustained dedication in the new energy power sector, we’ve achieved another major milestone: Secured a strategic order from Jiebu Power and officially become their core lithium battery supplier. This partnership demonstrates strong market recognition of our solutions and elevates our comprehensive competitiveness in power lithium batteries to new heights.

item.title: Company Launches Aggressive Overseas Market Strategy
item.description: After solidifying its leadership in China’s new energy power lithium battery market, the company has officially launched its overseas expansion strategy. Leveraging strong technical capabilities, exceptional product quality, and large-scale manufacturing advantages, we’re confidently bringing safe, efficient, and reliable lithium solutions to the global stage, actively participating in the worldwide green energy transition.
